recipes.title: French toast
recipes.description: Very delicious and easy to make french toast with cinnamon and orange jam

steps.2: Place in a bowl eggs, cream, salt, sugar and ground cinnamon and mix well.
steps.3: Heat pan with butter on medium heat.
steps.4: Dip bread in egg mixture, turning to coat both sides evenly.
steps.5: Cook bread slices until browned on both sides.
steps.6: Spread one side of bread orange jam and sprinkle with icing sugar.

recipes.title: Bread
recipes.description: Very delicious and easy to make sourdough bread with olives and rosemary

steps.3: Leave for proof for 5-6 hours or until tripled

steps.1: Mix 9/10 of water and flour for 3-4 mins and leave for 60 minutes
steps.2: Add remaining water, salt and sourdough and knead the dough 5-6 mins, leave for 15 mins
steps.3: Fold douh and leave for 30 mins chill. Repeat this step two times more.
steps.4: Leave douh for fermentation for at least 3-3,5 hrs or doubled
steps.5: Divide dough, preshape and leave for 20 mins
steps.6: Shape dough, place on bowl and place in the fridge for 12-14 hrs.
steps.7: Preheat oven for 30 minutes at 450 degrees Farenheit
steps.8: Place baking sheet with water on the bottom in the oven
steps.9: Bake bread first 15 minutes with steam, remove tray with water and bake additional 15-20 minutes
